div.p: Engage, educate, and empower every student every day.
Inspire every student to think, learn, achieve, and care.

ul.li: Building relationships is the foundation of success
We will meet the needs of all students
Collaboration and teamwork are necessary for success
All students can learn at high levels
Goal 1: Utilize the collaborative framework to analyze student data and build professional capacity of staff.
Goal 2: Implement quality instructional and assessment practices to maximize the performance of each student.
Goal 3: Communicate and build compassionate relationships with students, staff, families and community.
Goal 4: Establish and foster a safe and supportive environment for all.
